short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tells you who really owns the website you are on. It helps you knowing the possible bias.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Because a few media owners have a dark political agenda.
From one media to another, the same news will not be presented the same way.
That is not random:
The choice of words and images do have an influence on the way we see the world, even more over time.
After incessant repetitions, we do use the same words, and the words shape the mind.

BehindTheScene helps you knowing WHO wants to influence you
